author: Russ Bernhardt
comment: The color scheme and black background are perfect on the OLED screen and match the gold color on the watch. Very clean, easy to read and I get a lot of complements.
title: Perfect for gold LG Urbane

author: Brandon Joerges
comment: Super crisp and professional looking. Highly recommend this face!
title: Very Nice

author: Arun Thekkuden
comment: If possible can you have like a pack of all or at least a large number of your watch faces at a lower price ? Really like all your watchfaces but can't spend $150nearly on all of them XD
title: Great !

author: Andrew Fisher
comment: Love the look of this face! When in ambient mode however with the full watchface displaying there are two horizontal lines one just above the lion gate logo and one just above the centre point of the hands. Is there a way to rectify this? If so it will be 5 stars :)
title: Really liking it

author: Siddharth Sajwan
comment: The shiny gold and black works well. Looks especially beautiful on the Moto 360
title: Looks premium

author: Justin Arnold
comment: Great watch. Just wish I could change the color of the hands.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Justin :)
Thank you for the comment and I will let the designer so that he/she can consider about this option.

Again, Thank you!
Have a great day :)

author: Stephen Slattery
comment: Looks great on the gold LG Urbane

author: bluray1080jp
comment: I payed for this app because it didn't ask for crazy permissions but the next update they wanted to have access to user accounts. Shame on you i deleted this garbage app!!!
title: Bait and switch permissions

author: Kenny Honeycutt
comment: Beautiful watch face...I will recommend it to people... It's just a little too busy for me... Still a 5 star face... Just not for me... Thank you
title: To busy

author: Marcus Muehlbauer
comment: Overall a really nice watch face but the Moto 360 bar destroys it
